name: 100ML / 3.38 oz NIGHT POUR HOMME II SPORT
details: 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME // II SPORT EDP Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of bergamot, lavender and cedar. It’s a fresh, sporty and comfortable fragrance.

name: NIGHT POUR HOMME II + III 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME II + ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME III EAU DE PARFUM 2X100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).A collection of fragrances to give the finishing touch to your outfit, whether elegant, sophisticated or bold. Providing a dark and intoxicating touch at night, and during the day unveiling lively and magnetic notes.NIGHT POUR HOMME II, a modern oriental fougère where seductive and warm spices are intermingled with notes of dry woods for an intoxicating trail. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot, grapefruit and lemon wrapped in cardamom, lavender and nutmeg. In the background we find musky and vanilla notes accompanied by cedar wood, amber and tonka bean. A provocative fragrance for the man who defends his carefree personality.NIGHT POUR HOMME III, a woody fragrance that reveals an elegant and fresh character with an iridescent floral explosion. The fragrance pyramid reveals fruity notes of bergamot and pear, wrapped in iris, osmanthus, coriander and pepper. In the background we find woody notes of sandalwood and cashmere accompanied by leather and vetiver notes. A unique, seductive and irresistible trail.

name: NIGHT POUR HOMME II + NIGHT POUR HOMME II SPORT 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA NIGHT POUR HOMME II + NIGHT POUR HOMME II SPORT EDP 100ML / 3.38 oz 2 x (3.38 FL.OZ). Eau de parfum duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of bergamot, lavender and amber (I) + bergamot, lavender and cedar (II).

name: VIBRANT LEATHER 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA VIBRANT LEATHER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ). ALWAYS STRIVING TO MAKE SOMETHING NEW AND DIFFERENT"Vibrant Leather is the balance between the pacific and romantic side of woody notes and the vitality and intensity of leather." Jérôme Epinette, perfumer of Vibrant Leather.Woody eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals citrus notes of bergamot and lemon, bamboo, leather, patchouli and papyrus.

name: OUD VIBRANT LEATHER 100ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA OUD VIBRANT LEATHER EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).A HYPNOTIC LEATHER BLENDED WITH A WARM AND DARK BASE OF AMBERY NOTES AND OUD SCENT“Vibrant Leather Oud is pure harmony between the tenderness of oriental notes and the intoxicating sensuality of agar wood notes.” Jérôme Epinette, perfumer of Vibrant Leather.Woody eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals citrus notes of bergamot, kumquat and apple, incense, geranium, violet, patchouli, oak and oud.

In the background we find notes of leather, tobacco, patchouli and oud.

name: MULTI-POCKET BACKPACK
details: Multi-pocket backpack made of technical fabric. Featuring three main compartments in the same size, all with zip closure and a common clip buckle. The inside features a pocket for electronic devices of up to 13 and a zip pocket. Features two small front zip pockets. Top handle and two adjustable shoulder straps. Quilted back for improved comfort during use.

name: EXPLORER BACKPACK
details: Multi-pocket explorer backpack. Technical fabric. The main compartment fastens with a flap, gathering and a clip buckle. The flap has a small zip pocket. The inside has a pocket without closure for electronic devices of up to 13 . Medium side pockets with no fastening. Small front flap pocket with zip closure. Top handle and two adjustable shoulder straps.

name: MONOCHROME NYLON BACKPACK
details: Explorer backpack. The main compartment has a gathered drawstring closure and a flap with two clip buckles. The inside has a pocket without closure for electronic devices of up to 13 . Features a small zip pocket on the front. Top handle and two adjustable shoulder straps.

name: SLIM RUBBERISED BACKPACK
details: Backpack with a rubberised finish. Plain exterior. The main compartment closes with a zip and its interior has two pockets, one of which is large for electronic devices of up to 13 and another medium pocket with zip closure. On the front there is a medium pocket with zip closure. The back is padded and has fastening to attach it to luggage. It has one handle and two adjustable padded shoulder straps.

name: SPORTS BACKPACK
details: Multi-pocket backpack. Combination of materials and colours on the exterior. The main compartment fastens with a zip and features an inside pocket without closure for electronic devices of up to 13 . On the front it has a flat pocket with zip closure. Adjustable mesh pockets on the sides. Top handle and two adjustable shoulder straps with zip pockets. Ergonomic padded back for improved comfort during use. Adjustable chest strap with clip buckle fastening.

name: SPORTS BACKPACK
details: Multi-pocket backpack. Combination of materials and colours on the upper. The main compartment has two zip fastenings at different heights (the top access to the pocket is adjustable on each side thanks to two technical fasteners). Two adjustable mesh pockets on the sides. Top handle and two adjustable shoulder straps. Ergonomic padded back for improved comfort during use. Adjustable strap to the chest with clip buckle fastening.

name: ROLLTOP SPORTS BACKPACK
details: Multi-pocket backpack. Combination of materials on the exterior. The main compartment fastens with a zip and rolls up with clip buckles on both sides. It also opens from the front with a zip closure. Two small front pockets with thermo-sealed zip fastening. Featuring two adjustable mesh pockets on the sides. Top handle and two adjustable, breathable shoulder straps. Each compartment has a thermo-sealed zip closure. Ergonomic padded back for improved comfort during use. Adjustable chest with clip buckle fastening.

name: TECHNICAL BACKPACK
details: Multi-pocket backpack. The main compartment has zip closure and its interior has three small pockets with zip closure. Featuring two large front pockets, one with zip and the other with adjustable fastening. Side pockets with adjustable fastening. Top handle and two adjustable shoulder straps. Ergonomic padded back for improved comfort during use. Adjustable strap on the chest with clip buckle fastening.

name: NYLON TOILETRY BAG

name: NYLON BELT BAG

name: ULTIMATTE MATTE LIQUID LIPSTICK
details: Slick with it. Our favourite lipstick, now in a liquid version. Its full coverage, light, matte formula is transfer-proof and lasts for up to 16 hours. A lipstick that provides an effortless uniform finish for a gentle second-skin effect.

name: BRONZING POWDER
details: This velvety powder gives skin an instant boost, subtly warming up its tone while restoring vitality.Soft and delicate powder that conceals imperfections with a luminous finish.

name: 3-IN-1 BAR REFILL
details: Creamy texture multifunction makeup bar, available in two finishes: matte and pearl. Made with hyaluronic acid. Featuring an instant moisturising effect. This creamy textured formula is easy to apply to the cheeks, lips, eyes and body. Ophthalmologically tested.

name: CONCEALER
details: A creamy, luscious formula that is easy to blend. This buildable medium-coverage product features a satin finish, providing a luminous glow. Available in 18 shades to perfectly complement our foundation.

name: LIP OIL
details: This creamy lip oil glides like silk to achieve a uniform and eye-catching finish in a single swipe.This hydrating formula smooths lips while delivering a wash of colour and gleam you won´t even notice you have on.

name: EYELINER
details: This eyeliner with an ultra-thin and intensely pigmented tip glides smoothly to offer a uniform finish.The formula has been designed to draw precise lines with a long-lasting finish. Water-resistant and easy to remove.

name: EYELASH CURLER
details: Allows the eyelashes to be curled and raised in a single movement. Get a more intense finish by applying mascara. Includes two replacement pads.

name: NAIL SET
details: Set of nail art brushes. It is composed of three multifunctional brushes, ideal for easy design and touching up, and a pointer with a spherical head for maximum accuracy.

name: TOP COAT NAIL VARNISH
details: Quick-drying top coat that highlights the colour of the nails and ensures durability.

name: NAIL POLISH
details: Superior wear, naturally. This high-performance formula contains a large percentage of natural ingredients and lasts as long as traditional nail varnish.Formula made with a high percentage of natural ingredients. Its precision brush allows you to apply the product with total ease. Available in 39 versatile and trendy tones with matte, pearly and glitter finishes.

name: FACE BRUSH #3
details: Small face brush for the application of powder, cream or liquids in more localised areas. Rounded and precise shape. Ideal for applying highlighter or as a blending brush.

name: FACE BRUSH #2
details: Designed to apply powder and cream products. Perfect for blush and facial powder. The round compact shape allows you to modulate coverage until you reach an intense finish.

name: KABUKI BRUSH
details: Short and smooth dense-bristle brush, ideal for applying foundation and providing optimum coverage immediately.

name: EYE BRUSH #2
details: Compact and flat eye brush specially designed to apply eye shadow evenly.

name: EYE BRUSH #1
details: Small eye brush designed to blend or apply eye shadow in a precise way, achieving an intense finish and high pigment.

name: MAKEUP SPONGE
details: Makeup sponge specially designed for liquid and cream formulas. Allows for a simple, precise and adjustable application, achieving a natural finish. INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE:1. Moisten sponge with water2. Drain excess water3. Use the rounded part to apply liquid or cream formulas, blotting onto the skin.4. Use the flat part and tip for a more precise application5. After use, wash sponge with soap and water, drain to remove excess water and air dryView more

name: RED TEMPTATION 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA RED TEMPTATION EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum disguised as the warm and textured facets of beautiful Saffron and coriander spices; bitter orange lends a fruity and colourful touch to the luminous floral bouquet. The luminosity of jasmine reveals all the sensuality and femininity of white flowers, enhanced by a praline, modern and ultra-addictive accord. The flowers are highlighted by the power of moss and woody amber notes, enveloped in a cloud of musk, leaving a trail of complete femininity.

name: RED TEMPTATION 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA RED TEMPTATION EDP 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum featuring the warm and textured facets of beautiful saffron and coriander spices, with bitter orange that lends a fruity and colourful touch to the luminous floral bouquet. Luminous jasmine reveals all the sensuality and femininity of these white flowers, enhanced by a chord of modern and ultra-addictive praline. The flowers are highlighted by strong notes of moss and woody amber, wrapped in a cloud of musk, creating a complete trail of femininity.

name: GOLDEN DECADE EDP 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA GOLDEN DECADE EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ). Enveloping, warm and elegant eau de parfum for the woman who wants to transmit a sense of freedom and express her emotions to the extreme. A modern white floral bouquet (jasmine, orange blossom) sublimated by the juicy facets of mandarin reveals the seductive side of every woman. A sweet and addictive lavender adds a final touch with its original and unparalleled facets.

name: GOLDEN DECADE 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA GOLDEN DECADE EDP 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). Enveloping, warm and elegant eau de parfum for a woman who wants to transmit a sense of freedom and express her emotions to the extreme. A modern white floral bouquet (jasmine, orange blossom) sublimated by the juicy facets of mandarin reveals the seductive side of every woman. A sweet and addictive lavender adds a final touch with its original and unparalleled facets.

name: AMBER FUSION 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA AMBER FUSION EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum in which citrus freshness of bergamot and tangerine are mixed with sea-inspired notes for a stunning introduction and cheerful fluidly, which plays to prolong with the colourful hints and acids of red berries. At the heart, the floral and crystalline delicacy of lily contrasts with the floral value of sunny and captivating ylang-ylang. This multifaceted floral duo is accompanied by a deep and generous background where the sophisticated character of woody notes is softened by an overdose of amber.

name: AMBER FUSION 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA AMBER FUSION 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum where the citrus freshness of bergamot and tangerine blend with maritime notes for a stunning intro and lively fluidity, which plays to prolong with the colourful and acid notes of red berries. At the heart, the floral and crystalline delicacy of lily of the valley contrasts with the sunny and captivating floral essence of ylang ylang. This multifaceted floral duo is accompanied by an intense and generous background, where the sophisticated nature of woody notes is softened in contact with an amber overdose.

name: SUBLIME EPOQUE EDP 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA SUBLIME EPOQUE EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum that pays tribute to a sublime and radiant femininity. At the heart, a scintillating floral bouquet featuring jasmine, tuberose and orange blossom is brightened up in contact with the natural facets of bergamot. Vanilla and cedar mingle to form a warm and addictive background.

name: SUBLIME EPOQUE 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA SUBLIME EPOQUE EDP 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ).Eau de parfum that pays tribute to a sublime and radiant femininity. At the heart, a scintillating floral bouquet featuring jasmine, tuberose and orange blossom is brightened up in contact with the natural facets of bergamot. Vanilla and cedar mingle to form a warm and addictive background.

name: ROSE GOURMAND 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA ROSE GOURMAND EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum with the spicy notes of carnation, the luminous radiance of jasmine, the ethereal tenderness of peony. It is all there to adorn and enhance a rose with modern freshness and strong character! Far from the incarnations of innocence and purity, it symbolises and encourages the unstoppable wave of feminine empowerment, bringing the pure delight that every woman deserves. Soft, delicious and creamy caramel gourmand notes blend with a lively and regressive flavour of vanilla, reaffirming in a trail of musky amber the power of the rose.

name: ROSE GOURMAND 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA ROSE GOURMAND EDP 30 ML / 1.01 oz (1.0 FL,. OZ). Eau de parfum featuring spicy notes of carnation, the luminous radiance of jasmine and the ethereal tenderness of peony. It is all there to decorate and enhance a rose with modern freshness and strong character. Far from embodying innocence and purity, it bestows and incites an unstoppable wave of feminine empowerment, providing pure delight that every woman has a right to. Soft, delicious and creamy gourmand caramel notes blend with a lively and nostalgic vanilla aroma, with a trail of amber musk that affirms the ultimate power of the rose.

name: NUDE BOUQUET 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA NUDE BOUQUET EDP 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ)Floral eau de parfum. The main notes are cherry, peony and vanilla.

name: DEEP GARDEN 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA DEEP GARDEN EDP 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum. The scent reveals notes of pear, tuberose and tonka bean. It's a fresh, luminous and feminine fragrance.

name: LIGHTLY BLOOM 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA LIGHTLY BLOOM EDP 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum.The scent reveals notes of lotus flower, peony and musk. It’s a comfortable, captivating and elegant fragrance.

name: LIGHTLY BLOOM + DEEP GARDEN EDP 2x30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA LIGHTLY BLOOM + DEEP GARDEN EDP 30ML (1.0 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum duo set. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of (I) lotus flower, peony and musk + (II) pear, tuberose and tonka bean.

name: HIBISCUS 90 ML / 3.04 oz
details: ZARA HIBISCUS EDP 90 ML (3.0 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum in which the hibiscus flower highlights this fragrance with its opulent, fruity and delicately musky characteristics.A sunny, sensual and mysterious flower. A tropical citrus cocktail (bitter orange, tangerine) opens this perfume with a light freshness that evokes a summer on an island paradise. At the heart, peony flower is wrapped in the fruity, exotic and colourful facets of mango and passion fruit. Vanilla orchid and amber gradually envelope the fragrance in a delicate and comforting creaminess.

name: GARDENIA 180 ML / 6.09 oz
details: ZARA GARDENIA EAU DE PARFUM 180 ML (6.0 FL. OZ). A gripping fragrance of captivating silky white flower. Gardenia adds voluptuousness to the scent of orange blossom and coffee, within a fruity universe of peach and raspberry.

name: ROSE GOURMAND 10ML / 0.34 oz
details: ROSE GOURMAND 10 ML (0.34 FL. OZ). Floral eau de parfum. The scent reveals notes of rose, dry amber and vanilla. It's an intense, long-lasting and comfortable fragrance.

name: WONDER ROSE 180 ML / 6.09 oz
details: ZARA WONDER ROSE EAU DE TOILETTE 180 ML (6.0 FL. OZ). The fragrance reveals all the embellishment of a fruity cocktail formed by peach, red fruity notes and a hint of tutti frutti, which gives it a special luminous appeal.The sambac jasmine flower is wrapped in the creaminess of a vanilla and coconut note, guaranteeing an infinite addictive power. A fragrance designed for a charming and fun girl, who likes to reflect her personality through the perfume she uses.

name: WONDER ROSE 30 ML
details: ZARA WONDER ROSE EAU DE TOILETTE 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). This fragrance reveals all the fantasy of a fruit cocktail comprising peach, red fruity notes and a hint of tutti frutti that gives it a special luminous attraction. Sambac jasmine flower is wrapped in the creaminess of coconut and vanilla, guaranteeing an infinitely addictive power. A fragrance designed for a fun and outgoing girl, who wants to show off her personality through her perfume.

name: APPLEJUICE 30 ML / 1.01 oz
details: ZARA APPLEJUICE EAU DE TOILETTE 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). APPLEJUICE reveals a floral and fruity perfume, a lively and voluptuous fragrance. The scintillating notes of apple, orange and pink grapefruit reveal a fresh vibrant top note. At the heart the sensuality and femininity of a natural floral bouquet (rose, jasmine, violet and peony) is highlighted. The woody musky facets of cedar and sandalwood enhance the modern outline of the composition and add an enveloping touch.

name: FEMME 30 ML
details: ZARA FEMME 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette. Frangipani flower and peony top notes with subtle hints of bergamot create a vibrant sensation with incredible juiciness. At the heart, the seductive and crushed facets of orchid and heliotrope blend into the addictive creaminess of vanilla and tonka beans. The velvety base of white musk and warm woody notes lend a tactile and delicate character, enveloping the senses in an intense embrace.

name: APPLEJUICE 90 ML / 3.04 oz
details: ZARA APPLEJUICE EAU DE TOILETTE 90 ML (3.0 FL. OZ). APPLEJUICE reveals a floral and fruity perfume, a lively and voluptuous fragrance. At the heart they highlight the sensuality and femininity of a natural floral bouquet (rose, jasmine, violet and peony). The woody musky facets of cedar and sandalwood enhance the modern profile of the composition and add an enveloping touch.

details: ZARA ORIENTAL EDT 90 ML + WONDER ROSE EDT 90 ML (3.0 FL. OZ). Eau de toilette duo set. ORIENTAL: An elegant and enchanting oriental fragrance that reveals femininity. The fragrance shows fresh notes of bergamot and sweet orange wrapped in a scent of caramel and vanilla. The aromas are mixed to create the impeccable balance between citrus and candy. WONDER ROSE: The fragrance reveals the whole embellishment of a fruity cocktail formed by peach, red fruity notes and a hint of tutti frutti, which gives it a special luminous appeal.The sambac jasmine flower is wrapped in the creaminess of a vanilla and coconut note, guaranteeing an infinite addictive power. name: PINK FLAMBÉ 30 ML
details: ZARA PINK FLAMBÉ EAU DE TOILETTE 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ). A fun and boldly feminine fragrance with sweet hints of rose, jasmine and orchid wrapped in the warmth of vanilla, notes of wood and amber. A seductive, addictive and irresistible fragrance.

name: FABULOUS SWEET 100 ML / 3.38 oz
details: ZARA FABULOUS SWEET EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum. A slightly spicy juicy fruit comprising a luminous note of pear and scintillating facets of mandarin orange and pink pepper. An exotic sun floral bouquet (tuberose, ylang-ylang) sublimated by the refreshing facets of coconut water. An elegant woody patchouli blend wrapped in the addictive creaminess of black vanilla and tonka beans.

name: NUDE BOUQUET 100ML
details: ZARA NUDE BOUQUET 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of cherry, peony and vanilla. A fresh, pleasing and vibrant fragrance.

name: LIGHTLY BLOOM 100 ML

name: MAGNIFICENTLY DUBAI 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA OLFACTIVE/ No. 03 MAGNIFICENTLY DUBAI EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum. ¨From sunrise to sunset, bathed in adventure¨. Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. - The essence reveals notes of saffron, nutmeg and leather.

name: VETIVER PAMPLEMOUSSE 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA VETIVER PAMPLEMOUSSE EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ).“A white cotton shirt with hints of citrus cologne, an everyday accessory for my day to day”. Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. The scent reveals notes of grapefruit, tangerine and vetiver.

name: EBONY WOOD 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA EBONY WOOD EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ).“That moment of freedom and care-free adventures that are about to begin”. Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. The scent reveals notes of pink pepper, clove and ebony wood.

name: FLEUR DE PATCHOULI 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA FLEUR DE PATCHOULI EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ). “The essence of this fragrance captivates you, daring you to play with its creativity”. Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. The scent reveals notes of peony, patchouli and guaiac wood.

name: WATERLILY TEA DRESS 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA WATERLILY TEA DRESS EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ).“Soft jazz music plays in the background, picnics on the lawn, a vintage dress floats by in the gentle breeze”. Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. The fragrance reveals notes of vert de bergamot, spearmint and musk.

name: CAPTIVATINGLY PARIS 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA OLFACTIVE/No. 09 CAPTIVATINGLY PARIS EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum A love song sings to all our senses. Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. - The fragrance reveals notes of pear, rose and musk.

name: ELEGANTLY TOKYO 75 ML / 2.54 oz

name: ENERGETICALLY NEW YORK 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA OLFACTIVE/ No. 01 ENERGETICALLY NEW YORK EDP 75ML (2.54 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum. ¨Ignited imaginations will change the world.¨ Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. - The essence reveals notes of cardamom, jasmine and sandalwood.

name: FASHIONABLY LONDON 75ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA OLFACTIVE/ No. 04 FASHIONABLY LONDON EDP 75ML (2.54 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum. ‘Its soulful heartbeat always plays its own song.’ Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. - The scent reveals notes of bergamot, rose and musk.

name: UNIVERSAL OUD 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA UNIVERSAL OUD EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ).The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of black pepper, oud and patchouli. "From the blue sky of dawn to the amber twilight, in the desert every second is permeated by this beautiful aroma and its stunning presence. Love Jo X”. Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

name: LEATHER JARDIN 75 ML / 2.54 oz
details: ZARA LEATHER JARDIN EDP 75 ML (2.54 FL. OZ). Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of grapefruit, rose and a hint of leather. name: HIPSTER OUD 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA HIPSTER OUD EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ). Eau de Parfum. A warm dawn, lit up by orange blossom and the fresh radiance of blackcurrant, is blended with the delicate notes of rose and lily of the valley. As the day passes, the orange blossom is kindled and reveals its extreme sensuality under the effect of warm notes of amber and cosy musks.

name: PERPETUAL OUD 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA PERPETUAL OUD EDP 80ML (2.71 FL. OZ). Eau de Parfum. An extraordinary and daring fragrance. An explosive blend of pear with spicy pepper that heralds the arrival of red roses embellished with exquisite facets of saffron. A fascinating blend, enhanced by the powerful notes of amber and patchouli woods and wrapped in the comfort of musk.

name: BOHEMIAN OUD 80 ML / 2.71 oz
details: ZARA BOHEMIAN OUD EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ).Eau de Parfum. A fascinating and mystical getaway. The fresh burst of black pepper merges with the spicy facets of the everlasting flower. The allure of vanilla, refined, intense and with hints of leather unites with the irresistible texture of cocoa and the soft note of incense, whose woody and balsamic notes add an undefined charm to the fragrance.
